reviews.review: Still one of my favorites to this day. Haven't played it in years. The simplicity of this compared to L4D2 makes it the better experience, in my opinion. The hoards are still intense, the witches are still a bit creepy, and the gameplay is still fun. For the price, it can't be beat. Crank up the graphics (most modern PCs should be able to handle it. Not a very visually demanding game compared to current standards), put on some headphones (earbuds will work, but noise cancelling increases the immersion :D), turn off the lights (cause all "horror" games gotta be played in the dark, right?), and enjoy the experience! Left4Dead is still a 10/10 in my books. Highly recommended.

Para sua √©poca de lan√ßamento, certamente L4D1 fez um grande sucesso colocando zumbis, FPS e elementos de coopera√ß√£o e sobreviv√™ncia. Por√©m hoje, 2018, o jogo est√° cheio de trapaceiros (cheaters), hackers e outras porcarias de "jogadores" que s√≥ entram nos jogos online para matar os companheiros, atrapalhar a jogatina e sair.

Ent√£o infelizmente n√£o consigo recomendar o jogo. As poucas horas que joguei foram focadas, desde o in√≠cio, para fazer todas as conquistas, s√≥ para isso. Se quer realmente jogar algum jogo de zumbis da Valve, jogue o L4D2, que tamb√©m n√£o √© muito diferente em termos de jogadores ruins, mas ao menos tem muito mais conte√∫do de jogabilidade.

Un FPS (First Person Shooter) mezclado con survival horror que, aunque ya tiene 10 a√±os, es uno de esos juegos que han envejecido bastante bien. Destaca mucho en su modo cooperativo y en su excelente jugabilidad. En lo que se refiere a modos de juego, adem√°s del single player tenemos el modo campa√±a (cooperativo), versus y surpervivencia. 6 mapas cada uno con distintos subniveles (con posibilidad de agregar muchos m√°s), algunos tipos de armas y 4 personajes extremadamente carism√°ticos completan nuestras opciones. Del otro lado adem√°s de los conocidos zombies, tendremos 5 tipos de infectados especiales MUY interesantes con distintas estrategias que nos complicar√°n la vida de diferentes formas.

Pros:
* Cooperativo (de lo mejor que he visto en FPS)
* Jugabilidad
* Versus con posibilidad de manejar infectados especiales
* 4 personajes sumamente carism√°ticos
* Zombies!
* Apartado gr√°fico muy bueno para tener 10 a√±os.

Contras:
* No hay modo historia (s√≥lo single player)
* Escasa variedad de armas (solucionado en su secuela)
* La IA de los bots aliados a veces no es de lo mejor.

A pesar de su punto flaco en el argumento es, para m√≠ y sin exagerar, uno se los FPS cl√°sicos de la historia. 
Mi puntaje: 8.9 / 10


PD: Recomiendo bajar los 4 c√≥mics para cubrir un poco los faltantes de historia entre nivel y nivel.

I may not have nearly as much experience or hours logged as my friends, but I find this game facinating. I've only been seriously playing games on Steam for about a year, and this is one of the best purchases I've made.  The fluid graphics (thanks to it being from 2008) and seamless multiplayer make it awesome. I find it refreshingly difficult, thanks to randomized spawns and the ability to mod it and change the game up. Playing with friends is great. After you've escorted your group to safety, you'll feel like you've actually accomplished something even if you're just sitting in your parents basement playing an action/horror FPS from 2008 ;)

This game is fantastic Valve did a pretty good job with this game. The campain is awesome , but with friends it can be bether. The soundtrack good too , the caracters and zombies fantastic too. The maps are very big with many objectives for you and your mates think how to solve them and that gives a lot of fun . The another modes are Versus and Survival, both good too. This game deserves a 9.7/10.

Haven't played a Video Game in almost 12 years. First time doing serious PC gaming too. Left 4 Dead was the first shooter I had ever played, so I figured it would help ease me back in. Good way to learn keyboard/mouse playing, and just an all around classic for me. A staple game of my childhood, too bad I no longer have friendsss...
Love it, play it quite often. Never gets old. Just wish when I play solo the robot partners would help more like grabbing pipe bombs and using them!
